title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 246: Featuring Tony Twist
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL enforcer Tony Twist. Tony joins (55:05) to talk about his career, the game now, some crazy stories and a ton more. The guys also talk some NHL news including some recent trades, some big injuries, the Leafs struggles + a bunch more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
